    public class UnitClient
extends com.orbischallenge.game.SidedModel<com.orbischallenge.atz.objects.cores.UnitCore>
implements com.orbischallenge.atz.objects.interfaces.IUnit, java.lang.Comparable<com.orbischallenge.atz.objects.interfaces.IUnit>
    Base class for Friendly and Enemy units. Created by Orbis Access (Canada) Ltd on 15/06/2016.
